remarks: The connected component containing ` A ` is a superset of any other connected set containing ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)
statement:
concomp.2 $e |- S = U. { x e. ~P X | ( A e. x /\ ( J |`t x ) e. Con ) } $.
concompss $p |- ( ( T C_ X /\ A e. T /\ ( J |`t T ) e. Con ) -> T C_ S ) $.
$d A x $.
$d J x $.
$d X x $.
